disclaimer.title: Terms of Use & Disclaimer
disclaimer.importantDesc: Please read the following terms carefully before using this platform. By continuing to use it, you agree to these terms.
disclaimer.vtuberOnlyDesc: This platform is designed for VTuber (especially hololive) fans to find concert companions.
disclaimer.nonCommercialDesc: This platform is completely non-commercial and does not charge any fees. All matching services are free.
disclaimer.section1Title: 1. This Platform is a Companion Matching Service
disclaimer.section1Content: This platform is designed to help users find concert companions, not a ticket resale or account trading platform. We provide a 'shared entry' matching service where hosts and guests go to the event venue together.
disclaimer.section2Content: All payments must be made in person. Please do not transfer money online in advance. This is to protect your transaction safety and avoid fraud risks.
disclaimer.section3Content: Some tickets may require ID verification (such as overseas tickets, registered tickets, etc.). We cannot guarantee successful entry. If entry is refused due to ID verification, this platform is not responsible. Please carefully check the ticket type before applying.
disclaimer.section4Content: Users are responsible for their own actions, including but not limited to: being punctual, honest communication, and respecting others. Any violation of platform rules or laws will result in account suspension.
disclaimer.section5Content: We value your privacy. Chat content is only visible to matched parties and will not be shared with third parties. Please do not share sensitive personal information in chats.
disclaimer.finalNote: By using this platform, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agreed to the above terms. If you have any questions, please contact our customer support team before using.

disclaimer.canAgree: You can now agree to the terms

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: TicketTicket ("the Platform") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.section1Content1: When you use our Platform, we may collect the following information:
privacy.section1Item1: Account Information: Name, email, and profile picture provided through LINE or Google login
privacy.section1Item2: Listing Information: Content you post including event details, pricing, and descriptions
privacy.section1Item3: Communication Records: Chat messages between you and other users
privacy.section1Item4: Usage Data: Activity logs, device information, and IP addresses
privacy.section2Content1: We use the collected information to:
privacy.section2Item1: Provide, maintain, and improve our Platform services
privacy.section2Item2: Facilitate matching and communication between users
privacy.section2Item4: Prevent fraud and ensure platform security
privacy.section3Content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share your information: with matched users for necessary contact purposes; when required by law or legal government requests; to protect the rights of the Platform, users, or the public.
privacy.section4Content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. However, no internet transmission is completely secure, so please keep your account information safe.
privacy.section5Content: Our Platform uses third-party login services such as LINE Login and Google OAuth, as well as Google reCAPTCHA to prevent bot abuse. These services may collect information according to their own privacy policies.
privacy.section6Content1: You have the following rights regarding your personal information:
privacy.section6Item3: Delete your account and related data
privacy.section7Content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the in-app customer support.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to TicketTicket ("the Platform"). By using our Platform, you agree to comply with these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Platform.
terms.section1Content: This Platform is a concert companion matching service designed for VTuber (especially hololive) fans. We provide matching services between users, allowing ticket holders to find companions to enter events together. This Platform is not a ticket resale or trading platform.
terms.section2Content: You must be at least 18 years old or have reached the legal age of majority in your region to use this Platform. When using the Platform, you must provide true and accurate information.
terms.section3Content1: When using the Platform, you agree to:
terms.section3Item1: Provide true and accurate personal information and listing content
terms.section3Item2: Be punctual and honor agreements with matched parties
terms.section3Item3: Respect other users and maintain polite communication
terms.section3Item4: Only make payments in person, not through online transfers
terms.section3Item5: Comply with venue and ticket regulations
terms.section4Content1: The following activities are strictly prohibited on this Platform:
terms.section4Item3: Harassing, threatening, or bullying other users
terms.section4Item5: Any activity that violates laws or infringes on others' rights
terms.section5Content: This Platform does not handle any monetary transactions. Payments between users should be made in cash when meeting in person. Do not transfer money online in advance to protect your transaction safety. The Platform is not responsible for any disputes between users.
terms.section6Content1: This Platform is not responsible for:
terms.section6Item1: Entry refusal due to ticket verification or ID verification
terms.section6Item2: Any disputes, losses, or injuries between users
terms.section6Item3: Losses caused by service interruptions or technical issues
terms.section7Content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account at any time for any reason, especially when you violate these Terms of Service.
terms.section8Content: We may update these Terms of Service from time to time. Continued use of the Platform after changes indicates your acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.section9Content: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us through the in-app customer support.
